thread.title: Trevor Noah Wonders if Ivanka Trump Used ‘Nepotism Filter’ on Photo At Presidential Desk
thread.title_full: Trevor Noah Wonders if Ivanka Trump Used ‘Nepotism Filter’ on Photo At Presidential Desk

author: Lindsey Ellefson
title: Trevor Noah Wonders if Ivanka Trump Used ‘Nepotism Filter’ on Photo At Presidential Desk
text:
Trevor Noah Wonders if Ivanka Trump Used ‘Nepotism Filter’ on Photo At Presidential Desk by Lindsey Ellefson | 5:23   
Two days ago, after Donald Trump met with Justin Trudeau , Ivanka Trump posted a photo of herself in their presence. She was seated at her father’s desk and she gave the picture a caption having to do with women getting a “seat at the table.” 
Here’s the photo: A post shared by Ivanka Trump (@ivankatrump) on Feb 13, 2017 at 2:35pm PST 
Watch above to see The Daily Show ‘s Trevor Noah go after the younger Trump for, more or less, taking a photo of “Take Your Daughter To Work Day” rather than promoting real workplace equality. He mused that she probably used the “nepotism” filter and could have easily hashtagged the shot, “#wokeuplikethis…witharichdad.” 
“And what makes this really annoying,” he concluded, “is that three million more Americans wanted a woman sitting behind that desk full-time.” 
[image via screengrab]
